title: Sawbones: The Heartmobile
description: It used to be that if you needed to get to the hospital quickly, you would call the herse â€“ because it had the space to transport a person who was lying down. Well, all of that changed in Columbus, OH, with the Heartmobile, known as the first ambulance. Dr. Sydnee and Justin talk about its development, implementation, and the thrilling end of its ambulatory adventures.Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers https://taxpayers.bandcamp.com/Transgender Law Center: https://transgenderlawcenter.org/
author: Justin & Dr. Sydnee McElroy
